Welcome to lock stock and barrels app.
On here you'll be able to make and account, sign in, login, set a profile pics.
You'll be able to upload a repair to the database, with a picture, query it based on the different search screens.

This app does use a lot of data!! please be ensured to be connected to a fast internet connect, The wifi on campus is suitable for this.

There is a navigation bar to get to the different screens.
